author: amiller@businessinsider.com (Anna Medaris Miller), Anna Medaris Miller
title: Obesity is the biggest factor driving New York City's coronavirus hospitalizations after age
description: Crystal Cox/Business Insider In the largest study so far of US hospital admissions for COVID-19, researchers found that obesity was the single biggest chronic risk factor for admission, ahead of heart and lung diseases. Age remained the biggest predictor over…
content:
Crystal Cox/Business Insider
Since the coronavirus pandemic touched down in the US, health experts warned that the virus would hit some populations hardest — namely, older adults and those with underlying conditions like heart and lung disease. 
But now, it… [+4612 chars]
